title: FS: H804 Baseball Trade Cards - SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS: H804 Baseball Trade Cards - SOLD
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. Postage included in price.

Available today are a couple 1880's era baseball trade cards. Both are blank backed.

1. H804-31 Out At First. A little bigger than a T206. Clean, no creases.

2. H804-10 A Fly. About the size of a 1956 Topps card. Damage to top border, paper loss at bottom and back damage.

SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Tony
